member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.MefExtensions.DefaultPrismServiceRegistrar
member.summary: DefaultPrismServiceRegistrationAgent allows the Prism required types to be registered if necessary.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.MefExtensions.DefaultPrismServiceRegistrar.RegisterRequiredPrismServicesIfMissing(System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog)
member.summary: Registers the required Prism types that are not already registered in the .
member.param: The to register the required types in, if they are not already registered.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.MefExtensions.DefaultPrismServiceRegistrar.GetDefaultComposablePartCatalog
member.summary: Returns an for the current assembly
member.remarks: Due to the security restrictions in Silverlight, you cannot call Assembly.GetAssembly(typeof(MefBootstrapper)) So, we are forced to use Assembly.GetCallingAssembly() instead. To ensure that the calling assembly is this one, the call is in this private helper method.
member.returns: Returns an for the current assembly

member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.MefExtensions.Events.MefEventAggregator
member.summary: Exports the EventAggregator using the Managed Extensibility Framework (MEF).
member.remarks: This allows the MefBootstrapper to provide this class as a default implementation. If another implementation is found, this export will not be used.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.MefExtensions.MefBootstrapper
member.summary: Base class that provides a basic bootstrapping sequence that registers most of the Composite Application Library assets in a MEF .
member.remarks: This class must be overriden to provide application specific configuration.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.MefExtensions.MefBootstrapper.Run(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Run the bootstrapper process.
member.param: If , registers default Composite Application Library services in the container. This is the default behavior.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.MefExtensions.MefBootstrapper.CreateAggregateCatalog
member.summary: Configures the used by MEF.
member.remarks: The base implementation returns a new AggregateCatalog.
member.returns: An to be used by the bootstrapper.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.MefExtensions.MefBootstrapper.ConfigureAggregateCatalog
member.summary: Configures the used by MEF.
member.remarks: The base implementation does nothing.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.MefExtensions.MefBootstrapper.CreateContainer
member.summary: Creates the that will be used as the default container.
member.remarks: The base implementation registers a default MEF catalog of exports of key Prism types. Exporting your own types will replace these defaults.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.MefExtensions.MefBootstrapper.ConfigureContainer
member.summary: Configures the . May be overwritten in a derived class to add specific type mappings required by the application.
member.remarks: The base implementation registers all the types direct instantiated by the bootstrapper with the container. If the method is overwritten, the new implementation should call the base class version.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.MefExtensions.MefBootstrapper.RegisterDefaultTypesIfMissing
member.summary: Helper method for configuring the . Registers defaults for all the types necessary for Prism to work, if they are not already registered.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.MefExtensions.MefBootstrapper.RegisterBootstrapperProvidedTypes
member.summary: Helper method for configuring the . Registers all the types direct instantiated by the bootstrapper with the container.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.MefExtensions.MefBootstrapper.ConfigureServiceLocator
member.summary: Configures the LocatorProvider for the .
member.remarks: The base implementation also sets the ServiceLocator provider singleton.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.MefExtensions.MefBootstrapper.InitializeShell
member.summary: Initializes the shell.
member.remarks: The base implementation ensures the shell is composed in the container.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.MefExtensions.MefBootstrapper.InitializeModules
member.summary: Initializes the modules. May be overwritten in a derived class to use a custom Modules Catalog

member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.MefExtensions.Modularity.MefModuleManager
member.summary: Component responsible for coordinating the modules' type loading and module initialization process.
member.remarks: This allows the MefBootstrapper to provide this class as a default implementation. If another implementation is found, this export will not be used.
member.summary: Component responsible for coordinating the modules' type loading and module initialization process.
member.remarks: This extends the MefModuleManager for Silverlight to provide a MEF-based XAP type loader.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.MefExtensions.Modularity.MefModuleManager.#ctor(Microsoft.Practices.Prism.Modularity.IModuleInitializer,Microsoft.Practices.Prism.Modularity.IModuleCatalog,Microsoft.Practices.Prism.Logging.ILoggerFacade)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Service used for initialization of modules.
Catalog that enumerates the modules to be loaded and initialized.
Logger used during the load and initialization of modules.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.MefExtensions.Modularity.MefModuleManager.OnImportsSatisfied
member.summary: Called when a part's imports have been satisfied and it is safe to use.
member.remarks: Whenever the MEF container loads new types that cause ImportedModules to be recomposed, this is called. This method ensures that as the MEF container discovered new modules, the ModuleCatalog is updated.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Prism.MefExtensions.Modularity.MefModuleManager.ModuleNeedsRetrieval(Microsoft.Practices.Prism.Modularity.ModuleInfo)
member.summary: Checks if the module needs to be retrieved before it's initialized.
member.param: Module that is being checked if needs retrieval.
member.returns: True if the module needs to be retrieved. Otherwise, false.

member.summary: Gets or sets the modules to be imported.
member.remarks: Import the available modules from the MEF container. Due to Silverlight/MEF restrictions this must be public.

member.summary: Get or sets the imported XAP module type loader

member.remarks: MEF requires this be public in Silverlight applications.

member.remarks: This allows the MefBootstrapper to provide this class as a default implementation. If another implementation is found, this export will not be used.
